Matthew__06.1__Your justice: that is, works of justice; viz., fasting, prayer, and almsdeeds; which ought to be performed not out of ostentation, or a view to please men, but solely to please God.
Matthew__06.11__Supersubstantial bread: In St. Luke the same word is rendered daily bread. It is understood of the bread of life, which we receive in the Blessed Sacrament.
Matthew__06.13__Lead us not into temptation: That is, suffer us not to be overcome by temptation.
